settings.heading: Browse. Try. Buy. A new way to find your ring.
settings.description:
Finely crafted engagement rings
you can try on at home.

settings.text: Our rings are designed to last you forever, so you should be sure it’s the one for you. Customized in over 8000 ways, our original at Home Preview removes the stress and urgency of ring shopping. Dance around in your pajamas, take it out for drinks, or just sit and stare at – and take some time to fall in love with it.

settings.title: Select Your Favorites
settings.text: Build your home Preview box by selecting two rings and customize for metal, shape and carat.

settings.title: Try At Home
settings.text: Try on at home, ask your partner, ask your friend, take some selfies, return in 7 days.

settings.title: Finalize Your Ring
settings.text: Now that you've seen your rings, decide what you like or what you want to change. Come back on site to order the real ring.

settings.text: Here are a few of our favorites.

settings.heading: Just like the real thing.
settings.description: We developed custom 3D printed replica rings that look and feel just like the real thing and deliver them straight to your home — for free.

settings.heading: EXPERIENCE THE MAGIC AT HOME
settings.description: At With Clarity, we want you to shop with confidence and convenience. That's why our free Home Preview program is key to easily finding your dream ring.

settings.text: Well-cut simulant that looks and sparkles just like a real diamond.
Metal alloy that mimics the look of real precious metals.
Crafted with precision to reflect the quality of our real rings.
Ring replicas are available in nearly every style. Try on what looks exactly like the final ring.

settings.title: Customize your favorite ring styles in over 8000 ways.
